meanings.definition: A person who drives an automobile.
meanings.sent1: The automobilist drove carefully on the busy highway.
meanings.sent2: The automobilist parked his car in the designated spot.
meanings.sent3: The automobilist accidentally left the keys inside the car and locked himself out.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the city streets like a skilled automobilist, weaving through traffic effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The automobilist's love for cars was evident in the way he meticulously maintained his vehicle.

meanings.sent1: The automobilist industry saw a surge in sales after the new model was released.
meanings.sent2: The automobilist technology has advanced significantly over the years.
meanings.sent3: The automobilist design of the car made it stand out among the other vehicles.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was inspired by the sleek lines and curves of automobilist aesthetics.
meanings.sent5: The automobilist features of the vehicle included state-of-the-art safety systems.
